sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_571ff7c52f4a91106446cc96f699b6a3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.propUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>propUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var propUtils = Class.create();
propUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

         getWebexccProp : function () {
           var webexccprop = {};
           webexccprop.instanceurl= 'https://'+gs.getProperty('instance_name')+'.service-now.com/';
           webexccprop.url=gs.getProperty('agentdesktop_url');
           webexccprop.popupurl=gs.getProperty('screenpop_url');
           return  JSON.stringify(webexccprop);
     
        },
     setWebexcctable : function () {
            var sys_id=0;
			
			var actInfo = JSON.parse(this.getParameter('actInfo'));
			var webexcc = new GlideRecordSecure(gs.getProperty('webexccactivitytable'));
            webexcc.addQuery("u_callobject", actInfo.CallObject);
            webexcc.query();
			if(!webexcc.next()) {
				webexcc.u_ani = actInfo.ani;
				webexcc.u_dnis =actInfo.dnis;
				webexcc.u_queuename =actInfo.queuename;
				webexcc.u_wrapuptime =actInfo.wrapuptime;
				webexcc.u_callduration =actInfo.CallDurationInSeconds;
				webexcc.u_ringingtime =actInfo.ringingtime;
				webexcc.u_activitydate =actInfo.ActivityDate;
				webexcc.u_callobject =actInfo.CallObject;
				webexcc.u_calltype =actInfo.CallType;
				webexcc.u_calldisposition=actInfo.CallDisposition;
				sys_id=webexcc.insert();

				//Activities on Incident record;
				var actInfoString =this.getParameter('actInfo');
                var suser = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_user");
					suser.addQuery("phone", this.getParameter('ani'));
					suser.query();
					if(suser.next()) {
					var inc = new GlideRecordSecure('incident');
							inc.addQuery('caller_id', suser.sys_id);
							inc.orderByDesc('sys_created_on');
							inc.query();
								if (inc.next()) {
									var jsonPretty = JSON.stringify(JSON.parse(actInfoString),null,2);  
									inc.comments =jsonPretty;
								inc.update();
	
							}
					} 
							
			}	
            return sys_id;
       },
    type: 'propUtils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-18 23:13:15</sys_created_on><sys_id>571ff7c52f4a91106446cc96f699b6a3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>propUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_571ff7c52f4a91106446cc96f699b6a3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-26 19:04:04</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: general 10 && parseInt(phone.substr(0, 1)) === 1) { phone = phone.substr(1); var inputPhone1 = phone.substr(0, 3); var inputPhone2 = phone.substr(3, 3); var inputPhone3 = phone.substr(6, 4); phone = '(' + inputPhone1 + ') ' + inputPhone2 + '-' + inputPhone3; } else if (phone.length == 10) { var inputPhone1a = phone.substr(0, 3); var inputPhone2a = phone.substr(3, 3); var inputPhone3a = phone.substr(6, 4); phone = '(' + inputPhone1a + ') ' + inputPhone2a + '-' + inputPhone3a; } return phone; } // Creating the activity record in servicenow table function nowActivities(actInfo, ani) { var gaout = new GlideAjax('propUtils'); gaout.addParam('sysparm_name', 'setWebexcctable'); gaout.addParam('actInfo', JSON.stringify(actInfo)); gaout.addParam('ani', stripPrefixes(ani)); gaout.getXML(SetCCsysId); } function SetCCsysId(response) { var msg = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer"); if (msg) { //msg; } } openFrameAPI.subscribe(openFrameAPI.EVENTS.COMMUNICATION_EVENT,function(eventArgs){ if(eventArgs.type==='OUTGOING_CALL'){ adaf.contentWindow.postMessage(JSON.stringify(eventArgs),webexccurl); } });]]>false

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_4b6815b5472951105eb7f088436d431e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>activitytable</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

   
	        var sys_id=0;
			
			var actInfo =request.body.data;
			var webexcc = new GlideRecordSecure(gs.getProperty('webexccactivitytable'));
	        webexcc.addQuery("u_callobject", actInfo.CallObject);
            webexcc.query();
			if(!webexcc.next()) {
				webexcc.u_ani = actInfo.ani;
				webexcc.u_dnis =actInfo.dnis; 
				webexcc.u_queuename =actInfo.queuename;
				webexcc.u_wrapuptime =actInfo.wrapuptime;
				webexcc.u_callduration =actInfo.CallDurationInSeconds;
				webexcc.u_ringingtime =actInfo.ringingtime;
				webexcc.u_activitydate =actInfo.ActivityDate;
				webexcc.u_callobject =actInfo.CallObject;
				webexcc.u_calltype =actInfo.CallType;
				webexcc.u_calldisposition=actInfo.CallDisposition;
				sys_id=webexcc.insert();
            
				//Activities on Incident record;
				
	           //  phone format in servicenow

					var phone = actInfo.ani + '';
					phone = phone.replace('+', '');
					phone = phone.replace(' ', '');
					if (phone.length > 10 && parseInt(phone.substr(0, 1)) === 1) {
						phone = phone.substr(1);
						var inputPhone1 = phone.substr(0, 3);
						var inputPhone2 = phone.substr(3, 3);
						var inputPhone3 = phone.substr(6, 4);
						phone = '(' + inputPhone1 + ') ' + inputPhone2 + '-' + inputPhone3;
					} else if (phone.length == 10) {
						var inputPhone1a = phone.substr(0, 3);
						var inputPhone2a = phone.substr(3, 3);
						var inputPhone3a = phone.substr(6, 4);
						phone = '(' + inputPhone1a + ') ' + inputPhone2a + '-' + inputPhone3a;
					}


                var suser = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_user");
					suser.addQuery("phone", phone);
					suser.query();
					if(suser.next()) {
					var inc = new GlideRecordSecure('incident');
							inc.addQuery('caller_id', suser.sys_id);
							inc.orderByDesc('sys_created_on');
							inc.query();
								if (inc.next()) {
									var jsonPretty = JSON.stringify(actInfo,null,2);
									inc.comments =jsonPretty;
     							    inc.update();
	
							}
					} 
			}	

	
	return {
		message: 'WebexCC record has been created. The sys_id is ' + sys_id,
		error: webexcc.getLastErrorMessage()
	};

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/308173/webexcc/activitytable</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/activitytable</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-26 22:48:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>4b6815b5472951105eb7f088436d431e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>activitytable</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_4b6815b5472951105eb7f088436d431e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-18 23:52:21</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="WebexCC REST API">713e81bd47e551105eb7f088436d431f</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
